page.title: Sign in to you Rezilio account
error.login.reason: Your access rights are not valid
error.login.resolution: Please try again in 5 minutes, but if this problem persist please contact us at <link>support@rezilio.com</link>, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
error.expire.reason: There was a long period of inactivity or you may have cleaned your cookie
error.noaccess.message: We could not sign you in
error.noaccess.reason: There seems to be a problem with your account. Please verify your account has been activated and that you are using the correct credentials provided to you.
error.noaccess.resolution: Please try again in 5 minutes, but if this problem persist please contact us at <link>support@rezilio.com</link>, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
error.api.message: We could not sign you in
error.api.reason: There seems to be problem with your access
error.api.resolution: Please try again in 5 minutes, but if this problem persist please contact us at <link>support@rezilio.com</link>, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
error.404.reason: We couldn't find the page you are looking for
error.404.resolution: Please go to the Rezilio home page by clicking the button below
error.default.reason: There seems to be a system problem, this could be on our side or your internet connection
error.default.resolution: If this is a problem on our side we're already on it, meanwhile try clearing your cookie or wait a few minutes and try to sign in again
login.inactivity.text: To protect your security and data, we automatically end your session when you haven’t interacted with the site for a while.
login.error: Unable to Sign in. {br} Your email or password was incorrect.
login.welcome.title: Welcome
login.code.title: Authentification {br} 6-digit MFA code
login.code.text: Please enter the code you received {br} on your device.
login.code.error: Unable to Sign in. {br} If you need help please contact support.
login.timeout.title: Are you still here?
login.timeout.text: Do you need more time? {br} Simply continue with your current session.
login.outdated.line1: Your web browser {browser} is out of date.
login.outdated.line2: Update your browser for more security, speed and the best user experience on this website.
login.outdated.line3: We recommend one of the following free browers:
login.outdated.browsers: Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox
plans.no_plan.line1: No Plan has been created yet.
plans.no_plan.line2: Wait for you organisation to create one.
plans.text.search.input.tooltip: Your search must contain a minimum of 3 characters
plans.list.header.title: Site name
plans.list.nosearch: No plans found for given search
plan.toolbar.shortcut.rename.title: Rename quick access
plan.toolbar.shortcut.delete.title: Delete quick access
plan.toolbar.shortcut.delete.message: This action will not erase the text content.
plan.description.version.tooltip: Display previous versions of this section
plan.description.autotranslate.warning.m: Translator Disclaimer{br}{br}This content may be translated for your convenience using our tool powered by DeepL, an online language translation service that can translate text and web pages into different languages. No automated translation is perfect nor is it intended to replace human translators. Rezilio does not guarantee the accuracy of the translated text. Some pages may not be accurately translated due to the limitations of the translation software. Text in images, PDF files, Word documents or other document types cannot be translated. Rezilio accepts no responsibility and disclaims any and all liability for damages that may occur due to outdated or incorrect translations rendered by any third-party services, including DeepL and Google Translate. The use of any third-party link on Rezilio's website shall be at the user's sole risk. Auto-translation services are provided as a convenience only, and any third-party information and/or content is in no way an affiliation, endorsement, support or approval of the third-party, or the third-party service, by Rezilio.
plan.description.autotranslate.edit.moda: The text your about to edit has been automatically translated.
plan.edit.modal.info.saveQuit: Are you sure you to want to quit the edit mode? The entered information are automatically saved.
plan.edit.modal.info.submit: Send this draft for approval. This action cannot be cancelled.
plan.edit.modal.info.reject: This action will be shown in the <u>Journal</u>.
plan.edit.mode.bar.MODE_DRAFT: You have existing draft for this section
plan.edit.mode.bar.MODE_PENDING: New version is waiting for an approval
plan.edit.mode.bar.MODE_REJECTED: Your version for this section has been rejected
plan.edit.mode.bar.tooltip: The last submitted version to update this section has been rejected by {user} on {timestamp}
publication.title: Publications
publication.lang.tooltip: Publications in English. To see the publications in other languages, you have to choose the language from the context menu.
publication.list.header.plan.name: Name
publication.detail.modal.publish.title: Publish new version
publication.detail.modal.reject.title: Reject new version
publication.detail.error.modal.locked.bo: This section is currently being reviewed.
publication.detail.error.modal.unavailab: This section has already been reviewed and is no longer available.
support.title: How can we help you?
password.title: Reset Password
password.code.title: Reset Password
password.code.text: An 6-digit code has {br} been sent to you
password.code.enterCode: Please enter the code you received {br} by email or SMS.
password.code.error: Invalid {br} Verify you entred correctly the code you received. {br} If you need help please contact support.
modal.warning.title: Limited experience warning
modal.warning.message: You are using Rezilio on a mobile device.{br}{br}Please beware you'll might not have access to all features provided on larger devices.
